name: No Time to Horsefly
description:
No Time to Horsefly

No Time to Horsefly is a top-down rogue-lite puzzle micro-game set in the lifespan of a horsefly (10 seconds). Do you have what it takes to achieve happiness and leave a legacy for horseflies to come?

Use your chest to keep items safe, and try to help your descendants find their way to happiness!

Made for the Lumin Dare Game Jam 2022 

Controls Move 🏃WASD/ArrowsInteract 👉K/Q
